headerSubText.value: See what our satisfied customers have to say about our exceptional power washing services.
headerSubText.instructions: A short description of the section goes here. Should talk about what people are saying about the company.

value.body: Very professional and fabulous job on my home.
He responded quickly, came a day later and was out of here within 30 minutes.
Second time using DaveStar Powerwashing. The house looks amazing!
Came on time, did a great job, reasonable price.
Dave was very professional and friendly. I recommend anyone who needs the service call Dave first.
House looks brand new. The white pops; Dave did a great job.

testimonials.instructions: Use available information to create 2-6 testimonials in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors

example.body: The body for the first testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
